message: I propose dividing the money in a 3:2 ratio. This ensures a fair share while also considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose we split the money 60/40 in my favor.  This is fair, as my money loses value slower than yours.  Let's end this quickly.
I propose an equal division of the remaining funds. Given the inflation rates and the decreasing value of money, it seems fair for both parties involved.
